verses.roman:
nīlāmbara cakravartī haya tomāra nānā
se-sambandhe hao tumi āmāra bhāginā

synonyms: nīlāmbara cakravartī—of the name Nīlāmbara Cakravartī; haya—becomes; tomāra—Your; nānā—maternal grandfather; se-sambandhe—by such a relationship; hao—become; tumi—You; āmāra—my; bhāginā—nephew (the son of my sister).
translation: "Nīlāmbara Cakravartī is Your maternal grandfather, and by this relationship You are thus my nephew.
